https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/mquEWLRrYtGpgDUajPqEvgn8bai.jpg Casper and Emma get the opportunity to go to a real theatre. An adventure that sparks the idea to set up a play themselves. A play about yule lads who light lamps outside houses in the dark days of December. Casper and Emma at the Theatre
